content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'datalake_stpdbackbonedevdatalake_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [datalake_stpdbackbonedevdatalake_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://datalake@stpdbackbonedevdatalake.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [MasterBatchRecordData] (
	[ID] nvarchar(4000),
	[Timestamp_DB] nvarchar(4000),
	[Timestamp] nvarchar(4000),
	[ElapsedBatchRuntime] nvarchar(4000),
	[MbrNumber] nvarchar(4000),
	[ProductName] nvarchar(4000),
	[ProjectNumber] nvarchar(4000),
	[RunId] nvarchar(4000),
	[ExperimentId] nvarchar(4000),
	[DeviceId] nvarchar(4000),
	[SoftwareVersion] nvarchar(4000),
	[BatchId] nvarchar(4000),
	[TimeStampStart] nvarchar(4000),
	[MethodPatternId] nvarchar(4000),
	[MethodPatternComment] nvarchar(4000),
	[OperatorId] nvarchar(4000),
	[SupervisorId] nvarchar(4000),
	[StartComment] nvarchar(4000),
	[RunComment] nvarchar(4000),
	[SensorData] nvarchar(4000),
	[CPanelVersion] nvarchar(4000),
	[TcSolutionVersion] nvarchar(4000),
	[TwinCatVersion] nvarchar(4000),
	[Run_DbId] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'curated/tenant=PrinterCo/server=S-TSLA-DCU-002/db=CureVac DataLogging CUR00011 M02 DNA/table=MasterBatchRecordData/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [datalake_stpdbackbonedevdatalake_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [dbo].[MasterBatchRecordData]
GO
